response.summary:
Junior Front-End Developer with 1 year of experience. Looking for roles where I can develop my skills and experience
to contribute to work groups and achieve personal and professional growth Familiar with frameworks like React and version control systems like GIT.
response.skills: MongoDB, Bases de datos, SQL, Programación de aplicaciones, Lenguajes de programación, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en equipo, GitHub, HTML5, JavaScript, Git, Flutter, Bootstrap, Páginas web, React.js, Desarrollo de software, Aplicaciones web, Desarrollo front end, MySQL, Diseño web adaptable

profile_positions.description:
As a Jr. Fron-End Developer at Decibeles, I am responsible for developing and maintaining the company's web applications. I collaborate with designers and back-end developers to ensure that the application is functional and appealing to users.

Main Responsibilities:
       - Develop and maintain the web application using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, PERL and Javascript.
       - Provide technical support to clients and end users when needed.
       - Collaborate with the design area to ensure that the web site design and interface are working correctly. 
         working properly.
       - Be aware of the performance of the servers (Apache) where the web sites are hosted, as well as the databases that are hosted on the 
         databases that host the data to be processed.
profile_positions.title: web developer

company.name: Decibeles
company.description:
Grabamos mensualmente más de 1.300 estaciones de radio y 38 canales de televisión a nivel nacional las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana, registrando más de 15.000.000 de sonadas al mes.

Somos la primer y única plataforma de monitoreo musical en el país con presencia en los 32 departamentos y en más de 560 municipios.
